data.title: All About Arbuckle’s “A Country Hero”
data.meta_description: This is my own post for the First Annual Buster Keaton Blogathon, right here on Silent-ology! One of most sought-after lost silent films--part of a list including Hats Off, Heart Trouble, and some flick called Midnight London or something like that--is a two-reel short directed by Roscoe Arbuckle, A Country Hero (1917).
